item.title: Abigail add a quote by Shel Silverstein
item.description: "why can't you see i'm a kid', said the kid. Why try to make me like you? Why are you hurt when I don't cuddle? Why do you sigh when I splash through a puddle? Why do you scream when I do what I did? Im a kid." -- Shel Silverstein

item.title: Abigail add a quote by Britney Spears
item.description: "I get to go to overseas places, like Canada." -- Britney Spears

item.title: Abigail add a quote by Janet Evanovich
item.description: "Is that a bulletproof vest? See, now that's so insulting. That's like saying I'm not smart enough to shoot you in the head." Eddie DeChooch" -- Janet Evanovich

item.title: Abigail add a quote by Christopher Paolini
item.description: "Because you can't argue with all the fools in the world. It's easier to let them have their way, then trick them when they're not paying attention." -- Christopher Paolini

item.title: Abigail add a quote by Erma Bombeck
item.description: "Never go to a doctor whose office plants have died." -- Erma Bombeck

item.title: Abigail add a quote by Stephenie Meyer
item.description: "He's like a drug for you, Bella." -- Stephenie Meyer

item.title: Abigail add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Abigail add a quote by Steve Martin
item.description: "A day without sunshine is like, you know, night." -- Steve Martin

item.title: Abigail add a quote by John Green
item.description: "I figured something out. The future is unpredictable." -- John Green

item.title: Abigail add a quote by Paris Hilton
item.description: "What's Walmart, do they sell like wall stuff?" -- Paris Hilton

item.title: Abigail add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "A woman is like a tea bag; you never know how strong it is until it's in hot water." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Abigail add a quote by John Lennon
item.description: "As usual, there is a great woman behind every idiot." -- John Lennon

item.title: Abigail add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "There are no good girls gone wrong - just bad girls found out." -- Mae West

item.title: Abigail add a quote by Virginia Woolf
item.description: "Why are women... so much more interesting to men than men are to women?" -- Virginia Woolf

item.title: Abigail add a quote by Margaret Thatcher
item.description: "In politics, If you want anything said, ask a man. If you want anything done, ask a woman." -- Margaret Thatcher

item.title: Abigail add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "I'm no model lady. A model's just an imitation of the real thing." -- Mae West

item.title: Abigail add a quote by Betty Friedan
item.description: "No woman gets an orgasm from shining the kitchen floor. " -- Betty Friedan

item.title: Abigail add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "What would men be without women? Scarce, sir...mighty scarce." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Abigail add a quote by Eoin Colfer
item.description: "Good. Illegal is always faster." -- Eoin Colfer

item.title: Abigail add a quote by Rodney Dangerfield
item.description: "I came from a real tough neighborhood. Once a guy pulled a knife on me. I knew he wasn't a professional, the knife had butter on it." -- Rodney Dangerfield

item.title: Abigail add a quote by Rodney Dangerfield
item.description: "Once I pulled a job, I was so stupid. I picked a guy's pocket on an airplane and made a run for it." -- Rodney Dangerfield

item.title: Abigail add a quote by Lemony Snicket
item.description: "Criminals should be punished, not fed pastries." -- Lemony Snicket

item.title: Abigail add a quote by Jeff Lindsay
item.description: "Nothing in life is fair. Fair is a dirty word and I'll thank you not to use that language around me." -- Jeff Lindsay

item.title: Abigail add a quote by John D. MacDonald
item.description: "We were about to give up and call it a night when somebody threw the girl off the bridge." -- John D. MacDonald

item.title: Abigail add a quote by John Gottman (
item.description: "If you think your boss is stupid, remember: you wouldnâ€™t have a job if he was any smarter." -- John Gottman (

item.title: Abigail add a quote by John Dunning
item.description: "The world was getting dangerously crowded with crazy people." -- John Dunning

item.title: Abigail add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "To the well-organized mind, death is but the next great adventure." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Abigail add a quote by Jimi Hendrix
item.description: "I'm the one that's got to die when it's time for me to die, so let me live my life the way I want to." -- Jimi Hendrix

item.title: Abigail add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Do not pity the dead, Harry. Pity the living, and, above all those who live without love." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Abigail add a quote by Lemony Snicket
item.description: "It is a curious thing, the death of a loved one. We all know that our time in this world is limited, and that eventually all of us will end up underneath some sheet, never to wake up. And yet it is always a surprise when it happens to someone we know. It is like walking up the stairs to your bedroom in the dark, and thinking there is one more stair than there is. Your foot falls down, through the air, and there is a sickly moment of dark surprise as you try and readjust the way you thought of things." -- Lemony Snicket
